org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend

Class TopNNDCGMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.metrics.Metric<X>
      • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend.TopNMetric<MeanAccumulator>
        • org.lenskit.eval.traintest.recommend.TopNNDCGMetric

  • public class TopNNDCGMetric
extends TopNMetric<MeanAccumulator>

    Measure the nDCG of the top-N recommendations, using ratings as scores.

    This metric is registered with the type name ndcg.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Specification for configuring nDCG metrics.

    • Method Detail

      • createContext

        @Nullable
public MeanAccumulator createContext(AlgorithmInstance algorithm,
                                     DataSet dataSet,
                                     Recommender recommender)
        Description copied from class: Metric

        Create the context for an experimental condition (algorithm/data set pair). The default implementation returns null.

        Overrides:
        createContext in class Metric<MeanAccumulator>
        Parameters:
        algorithm - The algorithm.
        dataSet - The data set.
        recommender - The LensKit recommender, if applicable. This can be null for an external algorithm that does not provide a LensKit recommender.
        Returns:
        The accumulator. This will be passed to the individual measurement methods. If the metric does need to accumulate any results, this method can return null.

      • getAggregateMeasurements

        @Nonnull
public MetricResult getAggregateMeasurements(MeanAccumulator context)
        Description copied from class: Metric

        Get the aggregate results from an accumulator. The default implementation returns MetricResult.empty().

        Overrides:
        getAggregateMeasurements in class Metric<MeanAccumulator>
        Parameters:
        context - The context for an experimental condition.
        Returns:
        The aggregate results from the accumulator.

      • measureUser

        @Nonnull
public MetricResult measureUser(TestUser user,
                               ResultList recommendations,
                               MeanAccumulator context)
        Description copied from class: TopNMetric

        Measure a single result. The result may come from either prediction or recommendation.

        Specified by:
        measureUser in class TopNMetric<MeanAccumulator>
        Parameters:
        user - The user’s test data.
        recommendations - The user’s recommendations.
        Returns:
        A list of fields to add to the result’s output.
